Package com.csse3200.game.areas

Class BossRoom

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.areas.BaseRoom
com.csse3200.game.areas.EnemyRoom
com.csse3200.game.areas.BossRoom
All Implemented Interfaces:
Room
public class BossRoom extends EnemyRoom
A boss room of the game, these often have unique animals and rewards.

    • BossRoom

      public BossRoom(NPCFactory npcFactory, CollectibleFactory collectibleFactory, TerrainFactory terrainFactory, List<String> roomConnections, String specification, String roomName)
      A boss room with particular features.
      Parameters:
      npcFactory - the NPC factory to use
      collectibleFactory - the Collectible factory to use.
      terrainFactory - the terrain factory to use.
      roomConnections - the keys for all the adjacent rooms.
      specification - the specification for this room.

  • Method Details

    • getAnimalSpecifications

      protected List<List<String>> getAnimalSpecifications()
      Description copied from class: EnemyRoom
      Gets the animal specifications for the room. This method should be implemented by subclasses to define enemy types.
      Specified by:

      Returns:
